snippet.name: update
snippet.help: Save an SE object to the database
snippet.starttext: <cfmodule template="/#request.SEMap#/obj/update.cfm" object="$${object}" confirm="$${confirm:yes|no}" abort="$${abort}" message="$${message}" audit="$${audit:no|yes}" updatelastmod="$${updatelastmod:yes|no}" throwonerror="$${throwonerror:no|yes}" >
